formats.py¶

Holds big long strings to make writing files easier

note: double curly braces tell Python you mean a literal curly brace

when you’re formatting a string. “{a}, {b}, {{a}}”.format(a=1, b=2) produces the string “1, 2, {a}”

NPSM
